item.description:
We hold our monthly business meeting this month at Panera Bread in Needham. Come and hear what the club is planning! The board members who can answer any questions you may have will be here. All members and prospective members are encouraged to attend.

By actively participating in planning upcoming events, the more fun you'll be generating in upcoming weeks & months - let's continue the New Year in the way we mean to carry on - having more fun & enjoying life!

More info on Panera Bread locations
item.why: You'll love it because it's great to be in on the plans for upcoming events
item.name: BBTC Business Meeting - Spring Fling in Progress!
